backend/main.mo: Empty backend actor with a note clarifying that all marine/beach data fetching is handled client‑side.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI transparency updates, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI/theme changes of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS variables and Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell initializing the app root and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling tab routing, location persistence, weather fetching, theming, and layout structure including the header and language switcher.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Displays weather‑themed background images with smooth transitions and overlay gradients while keeping image logic unchanged.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: Renders marine conditions with loading, error, and empty states using glass‑surface cards and detailed sea/weather metrics.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar switching between weather, farmer, driver, radar, and beach tabs with reactive button styling.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Displays driver-focused weather advisories including ice risk, fog, tire pressure, and route analysis with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Shows farming and gardening advisories such as frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: A React error boundary that catches initial render failures and shows a refresh prompt with optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Provides recommended laundry drying time windows based on weather data, with fallback when no good times are available.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Searches for and selects locations via geocoding, showing current location info and a dropdown of results with loading states.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Shows a dismissible radar alert banner with severity‑based styling and translated text.
Side sheet for enabling radar alerts and adjusting radius settings via switches and sliders.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Displays a placeholder message when no radar data is available.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Shows radar summary info such as start time, duration, intensity, and direction for the current frame.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: Sheet UI for toggling radar overlay layers on and off.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and manages a Leaflet map, updating markers and radar/overlay layers based on props.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Displays loading, error, or no‑data messages for non‑precipitation radar overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: UI component providing timeline slider and playback controls for radar frames.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Main radar interface combining location search, radar map, playback, overlays, and alert systems with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Search input component that queries geocoding results and lets users select or clear a location with a dropdown UI.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides a weather‑theme context and wraps children in a light or dark container based on theme rules.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Displays current weather, details, advisories, and loading/error states for a saved location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Debounced geocoding search hook that fetches location suggestions and handles loading and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches marine conditions from Open-Meteo Marine API for given coordinates using React Query.
Manages a saved location in localStorage, providing load, set, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that queries are defined in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Generates severe weather alerts based on radar data and user settings, with support for dismissing alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data for radar overlays using multiple Open‑Meteo APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Handles radar frame playback state including autoplay, frame navigation, and frame labeling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Fetches and caches RainViewer radar data for a location with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Fetches weather at interpolated route points and returns an analyzed route weather summary using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Custom hook that syncs React state with sessionStorage for persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches and transforms weather data for a given location using React Query, providing current, hourly, and daily forecasts.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, translation lookup, and persistence via localStorage for the app's i18n system.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines Turkish and English translation keys and text used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Custom hook to access the i18n context, exposing translation utilities and locale state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, weather-themed variants, and glass-surface utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates clothing recommendations based on current temperature, precipitation, and wind conditions.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Calculates ice and fog risk levels for drivers using temperature, precipitation, humidity, and weather codes.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Defines advisory types and computes frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying recommendations from hourly weather data.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats an ISO date into a localized short weekday-month-day string for en or tr locales.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Computes hourly drying scores and classifications based on weather conditions and generates drying recommendations for the next 24 hours.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Defines weather data types and fetches current, hourly, and daily weather from the Open-Meteo API, plus location search support.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Fetches marine conditions and supplemental weather data, deriving wave, wind, visibility, and estimated sea surface temperature values.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Generates a simple radar precipitation summary including start time, duration, intensity, and direction from RainViewer frames.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Computes display parameters for various radar overlay types including storm, snow, wind, temperature, and air quality layers.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Fetches RainViewer radar frames and merges past and nowcast data into a unified structure.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Implements sessionStorage caching for RainViewer data with a 5‑minute expiration.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather data to score route risks across freezing, fog, precipitation, and wind and returns an overall risk rating with factor details.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Computes tire pressure adjustments based on temperature and vehicle type and returns a recommendation with a translation key.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Provides a helper to determine if a weather theme should use a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps weather codes to themes, icons, and description keys for UI display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state and features focused on applying consistent 30% opacity glass surfaces across all UI panels.
